metadata.synopsis: Two civilians are discussing the bruises one of them got from what he believe is a guilder. It was actually one of the Stone Men. This is the male human one-liner.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to -1; 50; -29.- Talk to the male human of the Bruised Local vignette.

0.speaker: Cormac
0.text: Can I help - ah! Bloody ribs. Sorry mate, had a run in with a mugger. If you need something, ask the missus.
0.context: NodeContext: 'ah' is a noise of pain, grips ribs, clearly in pain.

1.speaker: Cormac
1.text: Hey, don't be fussing over me - I get that plenty of that from my wife.
1.context: NodeContext: friendly, trying to make a joke even tho his ribs are clearly in bits
